charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1101_01:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was spotted
walking around the streets of Pasio.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1101_02: It seemed [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was looking for something specific.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_03:
I hear you’re looking for Looker Tickets, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_04:
Y’know, the ones you find for that training
course, “The Looker Method: Yes, even YOU can
become a detective in five easy steps!”
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_0402_08: Why do you sound so unsure of yourself?
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_09:
For this training, we’ve got to find the five
Looker Tickets that are hidden all over town.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_10:
This is apparently a training method Looker himself
used back in the day when he was a detective.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_11:
Word is it’s also great for building your bond as a
sync pair, so it’s pretty popular.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_12:
I know! Why don’t we work together to find the
remaining tickets?
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1101_13:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] teamed up with Hop,
and together, they found all five Looker Tickets!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_14: Here you go! Look, we found ’em all!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_16:
But tell me, did you two work together to
find them?
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_21: Oh... Were we not supposed to do that?
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_22:
No, you’re quite welcome to! In fact, I’m happy
that you did!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_23:
Working together is one thing that makes you a
good detective! It’s also the key to becoming a
good sync pair, too!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_24:
In fact, this Croagunk of mine helps me on
a daily basis! Any help your friends and
partners can give you is a huge asset!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_25:
Just be careful not to leave all the work to
others!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_26:
It’s all about how you use that connection...
Just like how Croagunk’s poison can be used
for medicinal purposes.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_0401_28:
The person who uses the poison is the one who
decides whether it’s used to help or hurt others!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_0402_30:
It sure is! The world is complicated, but that’s
what makes it interesting!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_31:
That’s why our job is to watch out for those who
might use those things to hurt others.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_32:
We’ve got to protect people and Pokémon
from villains!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_34: Thanks! I’m glad to hear you think so!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_35:
My job is the type that’s always skirting the line
of danger. To be honest, I’ve found it tough to
deal with from time to time...
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_36:
But it’s even worse to think of the people and
Pokémon who suffer at the hands of evildoers!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_37:
After all, precious Pokémon lives have been lost to
folks like that...
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_39: Oh! Sorry, that was quite a heavy topic, wasn’t it.
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_40:
Anyhow, before I forget, here’s your gift for
finding all five Looker Tickets!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_41:
You can use that to get a meal at any of the
fine restaurants on this island!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_42: Wow! I can’t wait to use this!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_43:
Youngsters like you should eat up so you have
the energy to always do your best!
charaepi_ch0217_00_handsome/2301_1201_44:
That’s what helps reduce the number of people
and Pokémon who have to suffer at the hands of
nasty evildoers!
